changes.change: Added the ability to set a status bar background color
Added the ability to change the camera and microphone indicator colors, or remove them altogether
Added the ability to change the color of different pill indicators on notched devices and the background on non-notched devices
Added the ability to change the color of the network activity indicator on applicable devices
Other performance and reliability optimizations and improvements
Fixed a bug where the the icons in settings would display wrong when Dark Mode is not enabled
Fixed a bug where the colors would not apply at all
